subject: Data
title: The Pie Chart Debate: Beloved but Broken?
description: A fast breakdown of The Pie Chart Debate: Beloved but Broken? for builders.

hook.text: Data visualization experts have been fighting about pie charts for decades. Most want them banned.

buildup.text: Pie charts show parts of a whole â€” market share, budget allocation, survey responses.

discovery.text: The problem: humans are terrible at comparing angles. Is that slice 23% or 28%? Nearly impossible to tell.

twist.text: Yet pie charts remain the most popular chart in business presentations. People love them despite the flaws.

climax.text: Tufte calls them the worst chart type. Others argue they're fine when you have few, distinct categories.

punchline.text: Everyone hates pie charts. Everyone uses pie charts.

quiz.question: Why do data experts criticize pie charts?
options: Humans are bad at comparing angles and areas
They can only show two categories
